Back to the Future.title: Back to the Future
Back to the Future.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
Back to the Future.filming_locations: Whittier High School - 12417 E. Philadelphia Street, Whittier, California, USA

The Breakfast Club.title: The Breakfast Club
The Breakfast Club.plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.
The Breakfast Club.filming_locations: Maine North High School - 9511 Harrison Street, Des Plaines, Illinois, USA

The Goonies.title: The Goonies
The Goonies.plot: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

The Karate Kid.title: The Karate Kid
The Karate Kid.plot: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

Parenthood.title: Parenthood
Parenthood.plot: Four Buckman siblings attempt to raise their children - each in their own different style - and deal with the joys and sorrows that the process brings.

Big.title: Big
Big.plot: A tragic and heartwarming story about children in Taiwanese pediatric oncology ward. This film explores how the children, their families, and hospital staff cope with the children's diagnoses and treatment.

The Princess Bride.title: The Princess Bride
The Princess Bride.plot: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
The Princess Bride.filming_locations: Cliffs of Moher, County Clare, Ireland

When Harry Met Sally....title: When Harry Met Sally...
When Harry Met Sally....plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.
When Harry Met Sally....filming_locations: Katz's Delicatessen - 205 East Houston Street, East Village, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA

Children of a Lesser God.title: Children of a Lesser God
Children of a Lesser God.plot: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

Field of Dreams.title: Field of Dreams
Field of Dreams.plot: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

Dead Poets Society.title: Dead Poets Society
Dead Poets Society.plot: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.
Dead Poets Society.filming_locations: St. Andrew's School - 350 Noxontown Road, Middletown, Delaware, USA

Driving Miss Daisy.title: Driving Miss Daisy
Driving Miss Daisy.plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.
Driving Miss Daisy.filming_locations: 822 Lullwater Road, Druid Hills, Atlanta, Georgia, USA

The Outsiders.title: The Outsiders
The Outsiders.plot: A heart breaking romance story between a delinquent and a model student. They try their best to make things work throughout the hardship they face.

The Color Purple.title: The Color Purple
The Color Purple.plot: A woman faces many hardships in her life, but ultimately finds extraordinary strength and hope in the unbreakable bonds of sisterhood.

Ferris Bueller's Day Off.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Ferris Bueller's Day Off.plot: A popular high school student, admired by his peers, decides to take a day off from school and goes to extreme lengths to pull it off, to the chagrin of his Dean, who'll do anything to stop him.
Ferris Bueller's Day Off.filming_locations: Ben Rose Auto Museum - 370 Beach Street, Highland Park, Illinois, USA

Top Gun.title: Top Gun
Top Gun.plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

Ghostbusters.title: Ghostbusters
Ghostbusters.plot: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

Mrs. Doubtfire.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Mrs. Doubtfire.plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.
Mrs. Doubtfire.filming_locations: 2640 Steiner Street, San Francisco, California, USA

The Sandlot.title: The Sandlot
The Sandlot.plot: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.
The Sandlot.filming_locations: 1388 Glenrose Drive, Salt Lake City, Utah, USA

The Mighty Ducks.title: The Mighty Ducks
The Mighty Ducks.plot: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

The Lion King.title: The Lion King
The Lion King.plot: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

Toy Story.title: Toy Story
Toy Story.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.
Toy Story.filming_locations: Pixar Animation Studios - 1200 Park Avenue, Emeryville, California, USA

The Little Rascals.title: The Little Rascals
The Little Rascals.plot: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.
The Little Rascals.filming_locations: 1000 block, Figueroa Terrace, Los Angeles, California, USA

Matilda.title: Mathilde
Matilda.plot: In the twilight of Imperial Russia, prima ballerina Matilda Kshesinskaya becomes the mistress of three Grand Dukes.

The Parent Trap.title: The Parent Trap
The Parent Trap.plot: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

The Iron Giant.title: The Iron Giant
The Iron Giant.plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

The Sixth Sense.title: The Sixth Sense
The Sixth Sense.plot: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.
The Sixth Sense.filming_locations: Striped Bass - 1500 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA

The Truman Show.title: The Truman Show
The Truman Show.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

The Green Mile.title: The Green Mile
The Green Mile.plot: A tale set on death row, where gentle giant John Coffey possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul Edgecombe, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.
The Green Mile.filming_locations: Tennessee State Penitentiary, Nashville, Tennessee, USA

The Shawshank Redemption.title: The Shawshank Redemption
The Shawshank Redemption.plot: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.
The Shawshank Redemption.filming_locations: Mansfield Reformatory - 100 Reformatory Road, Mansfield, Ohio, USA

Good Will Hunting.title: Good Will Hunting
Good Will Hunting.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

The Big Lebowski.title: The Big Lebowski
The Big Lebowski.plot: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

The Matrix.title: The Matrix
The Matrix.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Fight Club.title: Fight Club
Fight Club.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
Fight Club.filming_locations: 240 North Neptune Avenue, Los Angeles, California, USA

The Blair Witch Project.title: The Blair Witch Project
The Blair Witch Project.plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.
The Blair Witch Project.filming_locations: Patapsco Valley State Park - 8020 Baltimore National Pike, Ellicott City, Maryland, USA

Men in Black.title: Men in Black
Men in Black.plot: James, an NYC cop, is hired by Agent K of a secret government agency that monitors extraterrestrial life on Earth. Together, they must recover an item that has been stolen by an intergalactic villain.
Men in Black.filming_locations: Brooklyn Battery Tunnel Ventilator Shaft, Battery Park, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA

Jurassic Park.title: Jurassic Park
Jurassic Park.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

Titanic.title: Titanic
Titanic.plot: This documentary explores the incredible history of the Titanic. From the crew to its final hours, Titanic chronicles this incredible story like never before. Get ready for Titanic.

October Sky.title: October Sky
October Sky.plot: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

Great Expectations.title: Great Expectations
Great Expectations.plot: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.
Great Expectations.filming_locations: Vaudeville Theatre, Strand, London, England, UK

Father of the Bride.title: Father of the Bride
Father of the Bride.plot: A father's coming to grips with his daughter's upcoming wedding through the prism of multiple relationships within a big, sprawling Cuban-American clan.

Edward Scissorhands.title: Edward Scissorhands
Edward Scissorhands.plot: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.
Edward Scissorhands.filming_locations: Southgate Shopping Center - 2515 Florida Ave S, Lakeland, Florida, USA

The Addams Family.title: The Addams Family
The Addams Family.plot: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.
The Addams Family.filming_locations: New York City, New York, USA

The Nightmare Before Christmas.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
The Nightmare Before Christmas.plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.
The Nightmare Before Christmas.filming_locations: Skellington Productions - 375 7th Street, San Francisco, California, USA

10 Things I Hate About You.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
10 Things I Hate About You.plot: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.
10 Things I Hate About You.filming_locations: Stadium High School - 111 N. E Street, Tacoma, Washington, USA

Forrest Gump.title: Forrest Gump
Forrest Gump.plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Fargo.title: Fargo
Fargo.plot: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Clueless.title: Clueless
Clueless.plot: A devoted mother and wife has the seemingly perfect family and career, but her clueless husband is oblivious to the fact that their lackluster love life leaves her craving more.

Independence Day.title: Independence Day
Independence Day.plot: A police officer wants to eradicate terrorism and corruption. However, a threat from a terrorist organisation forces him to choose between his family and country.

13 Going on 30.title: 13 Going on 30
13 Going on 30.plot: Unpopular schoolgirl Jenna Rink makes an unusual wish on her birthday. Miraculously, her wish comes true and the 13-year-old Jenna wakes up the next day as a 30-year-old woman.
13 Going on 30.filming_locations: 1837 Spruce St, South Pasadena, California, USA

A Walk to Remember.title: A Walk to Remember
A Walk to Remember.plot: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

The Princess Diaries.title: The Princess Diaries
The Princess Diaries.plot: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.plot: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

August Rush.title: August Rush
August Rush.plot: A musically gifted orphan, Evan, runs away from his orphanage and searches New York City for his birth parents. On his journey, he's taken under the wing of the Wizard, a homeless man who lives in an abandoned theater.
August Rush.filming_locations: Muscoot Farm, Somers, New York, USA

The Notebook.title: The Notebook
The Notebook.plot: An elderly man reads to a woman with dementia the story of two young lovers whose romance is threatened by the difference in their respective social classes.
The Notebook.filming_locations: Boone Hall Plantation - 1235 Long Point Road, Mount Pleasant, South Carolina, USA

The Devil Wears Prada.title: The Devil Wears Prada
The Devil Wears Prada.plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.
The Devil Wears Prada.filming_locations: Musée Galliera - 10 avenue Pierre-1er-de-Serbie, Paris 16, Paris, France

Catch Me If You Can.title: Catch Me If You Can
Catch Me If You Can.plot: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.
Catch Me If You Can.filming_locations: Alcatraz Prison, Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA

The Aviator.title: The Aviator
The Aviator.plot: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.
The Aviator.filming_locations: RMS Queen Mary - 1126 Queens Highway, Long Beach, California, USA

The Departed.title: The Departed
The Departed.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
The Departed.filming_locations: SUNY Maritime College, Bronx, New York City, New York, USA

The Dark Knight.title: The Dark Knight
The Dark Knight.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

The Prestige.title: The Prestige
The Prestige.plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
The Prestige.filming_locations: Durango and Silverton Narrow Gauge Railroad, Colorado, USA

The Curious Case of Benjamin Button.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
The Curious Case of Benjamin Button.plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

Superbad.title: Superbad
Superbad.plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
Superbad.filming_locations: Fox Hills Mall - 294 Fox Hills Mall, Culver City, California, USA

Juno.title: Juno
Juno.plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes a selfless decision regarding the unborn child.
Juno.filming_locations: Coquitlam Centre Mall, Coquitlam, British Columbia, Canada

The Incredibles.title: The Incredibles
The Incredibles.plot: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.
The Incredibles.filming_locations: Walt Disney Feature Animation - 500 S. Buena Vista Street, Burbank, California, USA

Finding Nemo.title: Finding Nemo
Finding Nemo.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
Finding Nemo.filming_locations: Pixar Animation Studios - 1200 Park Avenue, Emeryville, California, USA

She's the Man.title: She's the Man
She's the Man.plot: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

Million Dollar Baby.title: Million Dollar Baby
Million Dollar Baby.plot: Frankie, an ill-tempered old coach, reluctantly agrees to train aspiring boxer Maggie. Impressed with her determination and talent, he helps her become the best and the two soon form a close bond.
Million Dollar Baby.filming_locations: Hollywood Athletic Club - 6525 W. Sunset Blvd., Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA

Get Smart.title: Get Smart
Get Smart.plot: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.

Die Hard.title: Die Hard
Die Hard.plot: Siavash, who is a car racing champion, decides to hold his wedding ceremony with his fiancée Sepideh, but Sepideh's mother demands a heavy and expensive ceremony from Siavash, and also asks him to provide a house in a great position for her daughter. Siavash, who is unable to meet the demands of the girl's family and on the other hand has a strong interest between him and Sepideh, responds to the suggestion of one of the smugglers, who needs a skilled driver like him to transport the goods by truck. Gives positive.

The Pursuit of Happyness.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
The Pursuit of Happyness.plot: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career
The Pursuit of Happyness.filming_locations: Candlestick Park - 602 Jamestown Avenue, San Francisco, California, USA

17 Again.title: 17 Again
17 Again.plot: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.
17 Again.filming_locations: Santa Monica High School - 601 Pico Boulevard, Santa Monica, California, USA

My Big Fat Greek Wedding.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
My Big Fat Greek Wedding.plot: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
My Big Fat Greek Wedding.filming_locations: Ryerson Polytechnic University, Toronto, Ontario, Canada

The Social Network.title: The Social Network
The Social Network.plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
The Social Network.filming_locations: University of Southern California, Los Angeles, California, USA

The King's Speech.title: The King's Speech
The King's Speech.plot: The story of King George VI, his unexpected ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.
The King's Speech.filming_locations: Elland Road Football Stadium, Elland Road, Beeston, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK

The Artist.title: The Artist
The Artist.plot: Peter as an artist is dangerously obsessed with his art and ambition, yet he manages to realize his dream with a way that he never dare to think of.

The Help.title: The Help
The Help.plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

The Descendants.title: The Descendants
The Descendants.plot: Jacob's family worries about Farrokh, the son of the family. Farrokh left Iran to continue his studies but he has not been in touch with them for a long time. Jacob travels to Sweden to look for his son...

The Hunger Games.title: The Hunger Games
The Hunger Games.plot: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

The Fault in Our Stars.title: The Fault in Our Stars
The Fault in Our Stars.plot: Hazel and Gus are teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially "An Imperial Affliction", so they embark on a journey to visit an author in Amsterdam.

The Great Gatsby.title: The Great Gatsby
The Great Gatsby.plot: A writer and wall street trader, Nick Carraway, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his mysterious millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby, amid the riotous parties of the Jazz Age.
The Great Gatsby.filming_locations: Centennial Park, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

The Lego Movie.title: The Lego Movie
The Lego Movie.plot: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.
The Lego Movie.filming_locations: Disney Studios, Moore Park, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

The Grand Budapest Hotel.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
The Grand Budapest Hotel.plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

The Theory of Everything.title: The Theory of Everything
The Theory of Everything.plot: Stephen Hawking gets unprecedented success in the field of physics despite being diagnosed with motor neuron disease at the age of 21. He defeats awful odds as his first wife Jane aids him loyally.

The Imitation Game.title: The Imitation Game
The Imitation Game.plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.
The Imitation Game.filming_locations: Sherborne School, Sherborne, Dorset, England, UK

The Revenant.title: The Revenant
The Revenant.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

The Martian.title: The Martian
The Martian.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

The Big Short.title: The Big Short
The Big Short.plot: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

The Shape of Water.title: The Shape of Water
The Shape of Water.plot: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

The Post.title: The Post
The Post.plot: A cover-up spanning four U.S. Presidents pushes the country's first female newspaper publisher and her editor to join an unprecedented battle between press and government.

The Greatest Showman.title: The Greatest Showman
The Greatest Showman.plot: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.
The Greatest Showman.filming_locations: 1 E 78th St, New York City, New York, USA

The Lion King.title: The Lion King
The Lion King.plot: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

The Incredibles.title: The Incredibles
The Incredibles.plot: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.
The Incredibles.filming_locations: Walt Disney Feature Animation - 500 S. Buena Vista Street, Burbank, California, USA

The Avengers.title: The Avengers
The Avengers.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

The Dark Knight Rises.title: The Dark Knight Rises
The Dark Knight Rises.plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part.plot: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

The Maze Runner.title: The Maze Runner
The Maze Runner.plot: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

Inception.title: Inception

Interstellar.title: Interstellar
Interstellar.plot: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Blade Runner 2049.title: Blade Runner 2049
Blade Runner 2049.plot: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

La La Land.title: La La Land
La La Land.plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

Moonlight.title: Moonlight
Moonlight.plot: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

Dunkirk.title: Dunkirk
Dunkirk.plot: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

Knives Out.title: Knives Out

Knives Out.filming_locations: Borderland State Park - 259 Massapoag Avenue, Sharon, Massachusetts, USA

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Pa.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

Avengers: Endgame.title: Avengers: Endgame
Avengers: Endgame.plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
Avengers: Endgame.filming_locations: Durham Cathedral, The College, Durham, County Durham, England, UK

Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse.plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Baby Driver.plot: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

Guardians of the Galaxy.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Guardians of the Galaxy.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Black Panther.title: Black Panther
Black Panther.plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

Spectre.plot: A cryptic message from James Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover the existence of a sinister organisation named SPECTRE. With a new threat dawning, Bond learns the terrible truth about the author of all his pain in his most recent missions.

Zootopia.title: Zootopia
Zootopia.plot: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

Toy Story 3.title: Toy Story 3

Toy Story 3.filming_locations: Pixar Animation Studios - 1200 Park Avenue, Emeryville, California, USA

Parasite.title: Parasite
Parasite.plot: A cleaning fluid experiment on an oil rig turns disastrous when a worker goes missing and eco-activists seize the rig, before a dangerous new creature forces workers and activists to band together.

Kung Fu Panda 2.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
Kung Fu Panda 2.plot: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.
